definition: The Broken Bridge (at West Lake in Hangzhou)
to break/to snap/to cut off/to give up or abstain from sth/to judge/(usu. used in the negative) absolutely/definitely/decidedly

sentences.english: Broken Bridge remaining snow is the famous scene of West- Lake, belong to one of ten scenes of West-Lake.
sentences.chinese: 斷橋殘雪是西湖上著名的景色，屬於西湖十景之一。

sentences.english: What problems should be faced in the operating process of the aluminum doors and windows.
sentences.chinese: 斷橋鋁門窗在操作過程中應正視哪些問題問題。

sentences.english: However, i ty dance as stand alone bridge.
sentences.chinese: 然而，我卻青衣舞袖般孤獨地佇立斷橋。

sentences.english: Aluminum green building materials, recycling economy.
sentences.chinese: 斷橋鋁綠色建材，循環經濟。

sentences.english: Although the Broken Bridge has only four archers left.
sentences.chinese: 雖然現在的斷橋只剩下四孔。

sentences.english: And then we'll go over and take a look at that bridge.
sentences.chinese: 先看這座斷橋，然後再到那邊去看看。

sentences.english: They are generated in the bridge, meet some wonderful story.
sentences.chinese: 他們就是在斷橋相會而產生了一段美好的故事的。

sentences.english: Well you can tell him I'll never set foot in Arefu again.
sentences.chinese: 好吧，你回去告訴他，我不會再踏入斷橋鎮半步了。

sentences.english: It is said every visitor to Dandong, would come to the Broken Bridge for a look.
sentences.chinese: 聽說幾乎每一個來丹東的人都會到斷橋來看一看。

sentences.english: It is now a severed bridge with only four arches. It has since become a witness of history.
sentences.chinese: 剩下的四孔斷橋，從此就成爲了一段歷史的見證。

sentences.english: In the wilderness of the bridge, while, the growth with a plum trees.
sentences.chinese: 在荒郊野外的斷橋邊，生長着一株梅樹。

sentences.english: You shouldn't miss Broken Bridge when you are on a visit to Hangzhou .
sentences.chinese: 當你在杭州遊玩時，你不該錯過斷橋。

definition: Baqiao District of Xi’an 西安市[Xi1 an1 Shi4], Shaanxi
to cut off/to interrupt/to prevent access
lit. boat made of lily magnolia wood/poetic term for boat
fine rain/drizzle/poem by Tang poet Li Shangyin 李商隱|李商隐
to swirl in the air (of thickly falling snowflakes, flower petals etc)/to flutter about
Canglang district of Suzhou city 蘇州市|苏州市[Su1 zhou1 shi4], Jiangsu
